newProducts.title: TrendRadar
newProducts.description: AI-powered news hotspot analysis tool that aggregates trends from 35 platforms with AI conversation features for trend tracking and sentiment analysis.

newProducts.title: ADK-Go
newProducts.description: A Go toolkit for building, evaluating and deploying sophisticated AI agents.

newProducts.title: LightRAG
newProducts.description: Simple and Fast Retrieval-Augmented Generation implementation, recognized for EMNLP2025. Focuses on efficient RAG systems for AI applications.

newProducts.title: VERL
newProducts.description: Volcano Engine's Reinforcement Learning framework for Large Language Models, designed for training and optimizing LLMs.

newProducts.title: Memori
newProducts.description: Open-source memory engine for LLMs, AI agents & multi-agent systems, providing persistent memory capabilities for AI applications.

whitelistUpdates.title: Series D Funding Round of $2.3B
whitelistUpdates.description: Cursor announced raising their Series D funding round of $2.3B and have passed $1B in annualized revenue. The company is used by tens of thousands of enterprises, including Salesforce, NVIDIA, and PwC.

whitelistUpdates.title: Version 2.1 - Improved Plan Mode and AI Code Review
whitelistUpdates.description: Released version 2.1 with improved Plan Mode, AI Code Review in Editor, and other enhancements.

whitelistUpdates.title: Agentic Security Principles
whitelistUpdates.description: Blog post about how GitHub's agentic security principles make AI agents as secure as possible.

whitelistUpdates.title: Next Edit Suggestions Through Custom Model Training
whitelistUpdates.description: Evolution of GitHub Copilot's next edit suggestions through custom model training.

whitelistUpdates.title: Making Copilot Smarter with Fewer Tools
whitelistUpdates.description: Improvements to make GitHub Copilot smarter with fewer tools.

whitelistUpdates.title: GPT 5.1, GPT 5.1-Codex, and GPT-5.1-Codex Mini Models
whitelistUpdates.description: New GPT 5.1 models are now available in Windsurf, delivering an upgrade for agentic coding with variable thinking and improved steerability.

insights.title: Claude Opus 4.5 - 'Best Model in the World for Coding'
insights.description: Anthropic's new Claude Opus 4.5 model claims to be the best model in the world for coding, agents, and computer use. Simon Willison discusses the increasing difficulty of evaluating new LLMs as models become more capable.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: Google Antigravity Security Vulnerability
insights.description: A security vulnerability in Google's Antigravity IDE allows prompt injection attacks to steal AWS credentials. This highlights security concerns in AI coding tools and IDEs.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: Constant-time Support in LLVM
insights.description: Trail of Bits contributes compiler-level protection against timing attacks in cryptographic code. This advancement benefits secure AI coding practices.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: NNGPT: Rethinking AutoML with Large Language Models
insights.description: Research paper exploring how LLMs can revolutionize automated machine learning processes, potentially impacting AI-assisted coding tools.
insights.author: Kochnev et al

insights.title: DRAFT-RL: Multi-Agent Chain-of-Draft Reasoning
insights.description: Research on reinforcement learning-enhanced LLMs using multi-agent chain-of-draft reasoning, relevant to complex coding tasks and agent collaboration.
insights.author: Li et al

insights.title: Fara-7B: An Efficient Agentic Model for Computer Use
insights.description: Research presenting a 7B parameter model designed specifically for computer use tasks, potentially applicable to AI coding assistants.
insights.author: Awadallah et al

insights.title: HeaRT: Hierarchical Circuit Reasoning for AMS Design
insights.description: A hierarchical circuit reasoning tree-based agentic framework for analog/mixed-signal design optimization, demonstrating specialized AI applications in engineering.
insights.author: Poddar et al

insights.title: Code a Simple RAG from Scratch
insights.description: Hugging Face tutorial on building retrieval-augmented generation systems from scratch, relevant for AI coding education and tool development.
insights.author: Hugging Face

insights.title: Mastering Tensor Dimensions in Transformers
insights.description: Technical guide on understanding tensor operations in transformer models, essential knowledge for AI developers working with coding models.
insights.author: Hugging Face

insights.title: Hacker News AI Discussions
insights.description: Active community discussions about AI effectiveness, open-source chat UIs, and visual intelligence models like FLUX.2, reflecting developer sentiment.
insights.author: Hacker News Community
